1: <mistake>/@@//dang / gzhol</mistake> ma dang <mistake>rangs</mistake> <mistake>mdang/shin</mistake> tu gzugs can ma <mistake>dang/ sbyi</mistake> ma dang rgyu <mistake>sbhyin</mistake> ma <mistake>dang/sbyor</mistake> <mistake>bal</mistake> ma dang sdug gu ma <mistake>dang / kgrub</mistake> <mistake>m</mistake> dang <mistake>'tshem</mistake> <mistake>dang/de</mistake> bzhin du yid <mistake>bzangs</mistake> ma <mistake>dag/</mistake>
2: gsum skor ma <mistake>dang / 'dod</mistake> ma dang khyim <mistake>adang/gtum</mistake> mo dang bdud bral ma'o//rdo rje <mistake>sting</mistake> pos gsol <mistake>pa/kye</mistake> bcom ldan <mistake>'das</mistake> <mistake>sumcsu</mistake> rtsa gnyis po 'di rnams ji <mistake>ltar</mistake> <mistake>lags/ bcom</mistake> ldan
3: <mistake>'angs</mistake> kyis bka' stsal <mistake>pa//srid</mistake> gsum yongs gyur thams cad ni//gzung dang <mistake>'dzon</mistake> pa rnam par spangs//yang na thabs ni thams cad <mistake>kis//dngos</mistake> po'i mtshan <mistake>nyind</mistake> <mistake>dun</mistake> <mistake>brtag /sdem</mistake> <mistake>pal</mistake>
4: dbye ba'ang bshad par bya <mistake>ste //A</mistake> <mistake>la</mistake> dang <mistake>k'</mistake> li ni zla ba <mistake>dang//dyi</mistake> ma <mistake>dang /shes</mistake> rab dang thabs so//chos dang longs <mistake>sbyod</mistake> rdzogs pa <mistake>dang //sprul</mistake> pa ni sku <mistake>dang /gsung</mistake> <mistake>dang/thugs</mistake> <mistake>so/e</mistake> <mistake>yi ma</mistake>
5: <mistake>.ya</mistake> <mistake>ni/e</mistake> yi rnam <mistake>pas</mistake> lha mo <mistake>sbyan//bai</mistake> <mistake>gi</mistake> rnam <mistake>pas</mistake> bdag mar <mistake>brjod//mani</mistake> lha mo gos dkar mo//ya yi rnam pas sgrol mar <mistake>brjod//smprul</mistake> pa'i 'khor lo la <mistake>pad+a</mistake> 'dab ma <mistake>drugcu</mistake> rtsa bzhi
6: <mistake>dang/chos</mistake> kyi 'khor lo la 'dab ma brgyad <mistake>dag/longs</mistake> spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo la 'dab ma bcu drug <mistake>dang/bde</mistake> ba chen po'i 'khor <mistake>lol</mistake> 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis so//'khor lo'i <mistake>grang s</mistake> kyi
7: rim pas rnam par <mistake>gzhag</mistake> <mistake>pa//skad</mistake> cig ma <mistake>bzhin</mistake> <mistake>ni rnam</mistake> pa <mistake>sana</mistake> tshogs dang/ rnam par <mistake>snin</mistake> pa dang rnam par <mistake>ped</mistake> pa <mistake>dang /mtshan</mistake> nyid dang bral ba'o//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni sdug bsngal
8: ba <mistake>dang/kun</mistake> 'byung <mistake>pa</mistake> dang 'gog pa dang lam mo//de <mistake>khon</mistake> nyid bzhi ni bdag gi de kho na <mistake>nyind dang</mistake> <mistake>sngla</mistake> kyi de kho na <mistake>nyid dang/ lha'i</mistake> <mistake>be</mistake> kho na <mistake>nyid dang</mistake> ye shes kyi de kho na nyid do//dga' ba <mistake>bzhi'ni</mistake> <mistake>dga'ba</mistake>
